name: Trackless (itch) (Quivscor, OrangeInside, Galapagos Guy)
description:
Headphones recommended for the best experience!

Train rides off the tracks to save passengers lost in snowy lands.

Follow the flares - both the explosion and the sound they make - to find them and drive to safety.

Manage the heat of the cauldron - the engine has more power the higher temperature you keep. Be careful, as riding with 0 temperature will eventually freeze the train and you will lose.

Procedurally generated environment will make sure your gameplay sessions are always different from each other.

Instructions:

Your train is fueled by coal and it's speed is related to the temperature of the cauldron. Be careful not to run out, as the train has to warm up the passengers. 10 seconds without temperature means game over!

Ride around looking for passengers, which will fire red flares to signalize their position. Flares make loud sound which also lead towards the camp.

Once you pick up all passengers, glowing yellow arrow will show up above the exit, located somewhere on the outer mountain range. Get there to finish the level and proceed to the next one!

Controls:

A/D or Left/Right arrow key - Steer 

Spacebar - Add coal to the train

Left Alt - Hand break - increases maneuverability while decreasing temperature in the train

S or Down arrow key - Reverse

Mouse - Camera control
